Package org.finra.herd.dao.helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AwsHelper
    A base helper class that provides AWS functions.
    CredStashHelper  
    ElasticsearchClientImpl
    ElasticsearchClientImpl is a stubbed version of the ElasticsearchClient used to setup a node for creating a SearchBuilder.
    ElasticsearchHelper  
    EmrHelper
    A helper class that provides EMR functions.
    EmrPricingHelper
    Encapsulates logic for calculating the best price for EMR cluster.
    EmrVpcPricingStateFormatter
    Formatter for a EMR VPC pricing state.
    HerdCharacterEscapeHandler
    A custom escape handler that escapes XML 1.1 restricted characters (http://www.w3.org/TR/xml11/#charsets).
    HerdCollectionHelper
    Helper for collections.
    HerdDaoSecurityHelper
    A DAO security helper class.
    HerdSearchQueryHelper
    Advanced query parsing for Herd using a simplistic DSL- this makes it easy for advanced users to fine-tune their search results.
    HerdStringHelper
    A helper class for general herd code.
    HttpClientHelper
    A base helper class that provides HTTP client functions.
    JavaPropertiesHelper
    A helper which abstracts logic for operations around Java's Properties class of objects.
    JestClientHelper
    JestClientHelper
    JsonHelper
    A helper class for JSON functionality.
    KmsHelper
    A helper class for KMS functionality.
    TagDaoHelper  
    TrustingAccountDaoHelper
    Helper for trusting account related operations which require DAO.
    UrlHelper
    A helper class for URL functionality.
    XmlHelper
    A helper class for XML functionality.
